titleStmt.title: The reflecter's defence of his Letter to a friend against the furious assaults of Mr. I.S. in his Second Catholic letter in four dialogues.
titleStmt.author: Ellis, Clement, 1630-1700.

notesStmt.note: Reply to John Sergeant's Second Catholick letter.
Attributed to Ellis Clement. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd. ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
